remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Count`已等於容量、 清單的容量加倍會插入新項目之前，會自動重新配置內部陣列。If `Count` already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`等於`Count`，`value`新增至結尾`XmlSchemaObjectCollection`。If `index` is equal to `Count`, `value` is added to the end of `XmlSchemaObjectCollection`. 向下移動以容納新的項目插入點後面的項目。The elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.

summary.span: 從 移除 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間成正比。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 亦即，這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫。This method determines equality by calling . 移除項目後的項目會上移，填補空點。The elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
